resources.string: Whether you\'re running, cycling, or walking, FitTrack monitors your activities in real-time.
Snap photos, track steps, and view your progress to show your improvement over time.
Get personalized workout suggestions and reminders to stay on track with your fitness journey.
Discover the best spots around you for a workout using our location-based services.
Keep a detailed log of your workouts, from weightlifting to cardio, and see how far you\'ve come!
